  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, String skin, Position position, int health, int maxHealth, Item holdItem, Direction direction)
      Constructor of Player
      Parameters:
      name - the player's name
      skin - the player's skin
      position - the current position
      health - the current health
      maxHealth - the initial health
      holdItem - the item in the player's hand, can be null
      direction - the current direction the player faces

      public int attackEnemy(Enemy enemy)
      Attacks the enemy by removing the quantity of damages of his weapon to his health
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy to attack
      Returns:
      the new health of the enemy due to the attack

      public void move(Direction newDirection, Position newPosition)
      Moves the player in a direction
      Parameters:
      newDirection - the player's new direction
      newPosition - the player's new position

    • movingAction

      public void movingAction(Grid grid, EnemiesGrid enemies, Direction direction)
      Moves the player in the specified direction if it is possible
      Parameters:
      grid - the grid used to test if the movement is possible
      enemies - the enemies used to test if the movement is possible
      direction - the player's new direction (can be null)

    • holdNewItem

      public void holdNewItem(Item item)
      Changes the item hold in the player's hand (can be null)
      Parameters:
      item - the new item to change

    • takeItem

      Takes an item from the grid and give it to the player
      Parameters:
      newItem - the new item to take (can be null)

    • heal

      public void heal()
      Heals the player with his item in his hand (if it is a nutrient) The healing equals to 30% of the player's max health
